{"id":634361404,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 months, 1 week","timestamp":1643980751,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"266 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/634361404/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Contiguous Array","memory":"83.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int findMaxLength(vector<int>& nums) {\n        unordered_map<int,int> s;\n        s[0] = -1;\n        int n = nums.size();\n        int acc = 0;\n        int ans = 0;\n        for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n            acc += (nums[i] ? 1 : -1);\n            if (s.count(acc)) {\n                ans = max(ans, i - s[acc]);\n            } else {\n                s[acc] = i;\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"contiguous-array"}
